name: False Summer Memories
description:
Kinetic Visual Novel about his childhood friend

History

(Way back on college I have a couple of game development projects, I lot of them was abandon and scarp. So I decided to finished this one and then someone message me about Thea's bday last time so.. I was thinking what if I'll put Thea in this game and do some a couple tweak's.)

You can play it on NewGrounds also - https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/819557
